# Module 2 Practice

This analysis is centered around building a model to predict the class of mushrooms (edible or poisonous) from a dataset provided in an excel spreadsheet. There were 8,124 observations of 23 variables. The initial R code was provided by the instructor, the description of the workflow in the Quarto document is my own work.
